1.content:
ok before we start this story which pokemon
league are they in?
1.title: which league?

choices: they saw the world they were heading for
purple gas in the vortex made them blackout
13.content:
jake had just invited his friends over to his house to watch a movie,
brandy was the first to arrive."hey brandy ready for the movie." said jake
"sure just don't do anything stupid." "now what would make you think that."
said jake with a grin."just move out of the way." said brandy "okay" said jake.

then ben and lisa were the next to arrive. "hey ben." "hey jake" they exchanged
handshakes and ben went to the living room."hi lisa"said jake and being
an airhead gave her a hug. lisa was blushing furiously but was able to hide it.

after everyone had meet jake and friends sat on the couch and when
jake turned the tv on nothing came up."what happened" said lisa.
"jake you didn't trip on the wires did you." said brandy. "who me, yes me, couldn't be, then who."
brandy raised her hand and SMACK slaped jake in the face."ouch what was that for."
"for acting so stupid." said brandy in a angry voice.

suddenly the tv shot a beam at the floor making a portal before they could even move
the portal had sucked them in. while they were in the vortex....
13.title: hoenn

choices: hit a white and green figure
132.content:
it was as if they where watching tv in the vortex cause it showed a field geting
closer and closer until they falling from the sky instead of floating in a portal.

as they were plummeting to the field they had different thought in there head.
"well i've had a good run i guess." thought ben. "I don't wanna die yet." thought lisa.
"if i live through this i will be nicer to jake .... maybe."thought brandy.
"im hungry when are we gonna hit the ground?" thought an air headed jake.

until finnaly they hit the ground, but instead of dieing they were just brused.
"wha what there's no way we should of survived that fall without breaking
something."said brandy. "well it doesn't matter now lets figure out were
we are....hey where's jake?"said ben. everyone looked around until lisa
had found him sort of. "he's over here but his heads stuck underground."
brandy was just laughing her head off while ben and lisa were trying to
get jake's head out of the hole until it finally poped out, but instead of
jake laying on the ground he was flung into the air and was about to....
132.title: they saw the world they were heading for

info.brief_description: what would happen if you and your friends are transported to the world of pokemon.
info.description:
alright this is my fist story yay

anyway plot line or whaterver:you had just invited your three friends over to
your house to watch a movie but when you turn the tv on a portal
shot out of it and sucked you and your friend into the world of pokemon
now you and your friends have to try to find your way home with some help of course.

characters:jake/you age:14 jake is a adventurous teen that is a kind person
and likes to make new friends, is athletic, and protects his friends no matter what,
and is sort of an airhead at times.

ben: age:14 ben is a strategic kind of guy likes a challange, and can be
a bit braty at times.

lisa: age:14 lisa is a nice kind hearted girl, loves animals, and has a crush on
jake but is to shy to tell him.

brandy: age:14 brandy is jake's next door neighbor and hates when jake acts or does
somthing stupid but if gotten angry she will hurt any one in her way.

rules: you can make it that somehow in a situation jake and lisa fall in love,
no sex sorry, jake and friends can find pokemon for themselfs,
keep the story going youn can stop it at around 30 chapters if you want,
no making the chapter a sentence short, and no ending it like "and then they
got back home the end". you can choose to have characters from the games
ex:firered,grassgreen,ruby,peal,etc. or maincharcters from the shows.

other than that go crazy and shoot yourself in the head not really though.

oh and ill start a story for ya'll.
info.pretty_title: in the world of pokemon with friends
